Package abyss.plugin.api

Class Move

java.lang.Object
abyss.plugin.api.Move
public final class Move extends Object
Provides ways of moving the local player.

  • Method Details

    • to

      public static void to(Vector3i tile, int type)
      Makes the local player walk to the provided tile.

      The way in which the client walks is up to client, and depends on heuristics configured by the end-user.

      Parameters:
      tile - The tile to walk to

    • traverseBlocking

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public static boolean traverseBlocking(Vector3i tile, long timeout)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Traverse the world using a web. This method will not return until game state is invalidated or the local player is within the target destination.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile to traverse to.
      timeout - The movement timeout.
